content: Based on the provided privacy notice, it doesn't seem like there is any specific body or organization that your leads generation company needs to be affiliated with. However, you should ensure that your company complies with all relevant data protection laws and regulations, such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) if your business operates within the European Union. It's also important to note that if you are obtaining leads from third-party sources, you should ensure that these sources are GDPR-compliant and that individuals have willingly opted in to be contacted by businesses within your group.
